definition: to weave/to plait/to organize/to group/to arrange/to edit/to compile/to write/to compose/to fabricate

sentences.english: This reed-woven flower basket is very refined.
sentences.chinese: 这个草编花篮十分精致。

sentences.english: Avoid standing on straw weaving and rattan weaving cushion.
sentences.chinese: 请不要站在草编或藤编的座垫上。

sentences.english: China' s woven straw items are popular for their elegant designs and practicality.
sentences.chinese: 中国草编艺术因其图案精巧和实用性而受到喜爱。

sentences.english: Next, we're going to take a look at Laizhou's unique straw weaving.
sentences.chinese: 下面我们就要去体验一下莱州非常有特色的草编。

sentences.english: Straw plaiting is a method of manufacturing textiles by braiding straw. Straw is plaited to produce products including hats and ornaments.
sentences.chinese: 草编工艺指用稻草来编织物品，包括帽子和装饰物。

definition: woven palm fiber (used in handicraft)/coir/woven coconut fiber
thin bamboo strips used for basket weaving
batik (color printing on cloth using wax)
a small bag full of fragrance used on Dragon boat Festival
